Description: On US-220 in the County of Franklin, in the vicinity of Naff Rd; Rt. 613E/W (Franklin County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The north left lane, left center lane, right center lane, and right lane are closed. The south left lane, left center lane, right center lane, and right lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire
